entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,77}{F813,0,226002}This is the control device for what you{F801}call the Yamato Perpetual Reactor.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,226003}We created it...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,77}{F813,0,226002}This is the control device for what you{F801}call the Yamato Perpetual Reactor.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,226003}We created it...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,75}{F813,0,226004}Yamato was originally a particle{F801}accelerator that creates a black hole.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,226005}Destroy Yamato's control device...{F801}let it run amok. Have it swallow the{F801}entire universe.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,75}{F813,0,226004}Yamato was originally a particle{F801}accelerator that creates a black hole.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,226005}Destroy Yamato's control device...{F801}let it run amok. Have it swallow the{F801}entire universe.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,226006}Thanks to your fifth self, we humans{F801}will finally be free of God's plan...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}The White\0{F87A,124}{F813,0,226006}Thanks to your fifth self, we humans{F801}will finally be free of God's plan...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}The White\0{F813,0,226007}Now, Messiah. Lead us to nothingness...{F801}
